about_the_game:
Chaos sisters is a beat'em up of demon girls fighting their way through monsters and heroes.
Puna & Sini are two demons slacking on guard duty, when a party of heroes invades their home dungeon! Now surrounded by furious former allies, the sisters have to slay each hero... or The Master will have their heads!


Play in two completely different fighting styles: Fiery Puna fights up close and personal with her quick melee combat. Set the battleground ablaze and wreak havoc!


Sini barrages enemies with heavy hitting spells. Store spell-charges and combine spells into powerful invocations to utterly annihilate your foes!

Features:
  • Fight your way through a prologue and 6 unique stages.
  • Encounter over 20 unique monsters and conquer 6+ bossfights, not a single recoloured enemy!
  • Play as two demons with completely different fighting styles.
  • Talk with the monsters and heroes with character specific dialogue and jokes.
  • Collect secrets, and uncover the truth of the fateful night.
  • Over 20 illustrated cutscenes!
  • Appreciate the wonderful soundtrack.
  • Enjoy the hand-drawn 2D animation combat-a-palooza!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains mostly cartoony violence, but some heroes have stylized violent deaths and visible wounds / blood. Contains character turning themselves undead, which might be perceived as suicide.

name: Chaos Sisters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8350K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.01 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 498 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should run well on any computer, but I added the specs that the game was developed in just in case. Try the demo first if you're unsure!

short_description: Chaos sisters is a beat'em up of demon girls fighting their way through monsters and heroes. Fiery Puna fights in close combat hack and slash style, while Sini casts a barrage of spells and combines them to conjure powerful Invocations. Uncover secrets and survive the night!
